reviewText: DVD won't play on dvd machines in Europe. I was only able to use it in my laptop. Very disappointed.
I wanted one of the movies and while looking found 4!  These are all good movies and I'm looking forward to watching them.
They were all very different kinds of movies, but each one was engaging and a good wath
I ordered this mostly for "love song" which is an awesome movie...."pretty horses" and others were a bonus at a lower cost than a single DVD so I am very happy with this.
Good movies. It was a great bargin. My favorite was all the pretty horse's. Also love song for bobby long was really good too.

I highly recommend this choice ....

The actors are new in their professions and surprised me with their grasp of the characters and depth of the story...

Great job and the selections are well chosen for many re viewing for years to come...

Thank you Amazon for this selection made available...

Karen Kohr Blinn
all the movies were worth watching, i just got dvds for all the pretty horses, but all the movies were good....

Okay. The item here, I did NOT receive. They sent me the wrong disc. It was 3 movies, but NOT this one. So I wrote several times, I tried to get a refund or exchange. No luck. So I chalked it up as money down the drain. However, I ordered LOVE SONG FOR BOBBY LONG as a stand alone from another Amazon vendor and it is just a great southern movie, based on a great southern novel John Travolta and Scarlett Johansen are both at the top of their games.
